details.description:
British Embassy, PO Box 3, Doha. 
Tel: 00974 44962000
Location: West Bay, off Wahda St near Rainbow roundabout.
Embassy Office hours: Sunday to Thursday 08:00- 15:30
The consular appointment hours are: Sunday and Wednesday 10-2 and Monday and Tuesday 8-10
For information about:
Consular services to British nationals: consular.DOHAA@fco.gov.uk
UK Trade & Investment enquiries: UKTI.Doha@fco.gov.uk
Visa International Enquiry Service: https://www.gov.uk/contact-ukvi-outside-uk
details.access_and_opening_times:
British Embassy, PO Box 3, Doha. Tel: 00974 44962000 Location: West Bey, off Wahda St near Rainbow roundabout. Opening hours: Sunday 11:00 - 14:00, Monday to Thursday 08:00 - 10:00

Public holidays

The Embassy will be closed for all business, except emergencies affecting British nationals, on the following days:

Date Holiday
Wednesday 1st January New Year’s Day
Thursday 17th April In Lieu of Good Friday
Sunday 20th April Easter Sunday
Sunday 4th May In Lieu of Early May Bank Holiday (May 5th)
Sunday 25th May In Lieu of Late May Bank Holiday (May 26th)
Monday 28th July Provisional date of Eid al Fitr*
Tuesday 29th July Provisional date of Eid al Fitr*
Wednesday 30th July Provisional date of Eid al Fitr*
Sunday 5th October Provisional Date of Eid al Adha*
Monday 6th October Provisional Date of Eid al Adha*
Thuesday 7th October Provisional Date of Eid al Adha*
Thursday 18th December Qatar National Day
Thursday 25th December Christmas Day
Sunday 28th December In lieu of Boxing Day

*Expected dates of both holidays, although actual dates may move depending upon sighting of the moon.

Disabled access

Adaptive (Disabled) Parking:

There are reserved parking spaces for disabled visitors in the Embassy’s internal car park. For security purposes visitors wishing to make use of such a space must contact the Embassy at least 24-hours before their visit in order that appropriate security checks can be completed to assist with access to the Embassy.

Adaptive (Disabled) Access:

There is direct access to the Embassy for disabled visitors from the Embassy car park. Visitors with mobility or visual impairments are requested to call the Embassy in advance of their visit in order that we can assist access to the Embassy through our security turnstiles.
